titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: OVERSEAS VISITOR EXEMPT CATEGORY - Description

div.p: A category indicating the circumstances in which Overseas Visitors are not liable to have to pay to use the National Health Service.
For further information and the categories, see the NHS website at: How to access NHS services in England.
This item is not referenced in a data set in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary. It has been retained to ensure the modelling is consistent.
